metadata.name: ONE
metadata.description:
Bible Study III: ONE

“I and the Father are one.” John 10:30

You shall hide,  
You shall seek.  
In the end,  
We always meet.  
Only to discover,  
There has never been another.

*

Know thyself  
The truth shall set you free  
The kingdom of God is within you

*

“Truly, truly, I say to you, whoever believes in me will also do the works that I do; and greater works than these will he do, because I am going to the Father.” John 14:12


{For Frank, in love and gratitude for all the light and all the darkness.}


***

A self portrait, part three of a triptych that came to me as a visual for my first ever NFT drop. I made the background myself, using the brittle pages of an old falling-apart Bible in German, which found me in mysterious ways. The previous two pieces are called Bible Study I: Within and Bible Study II: Anew, find them in the dawn my Foundation gallery. Everything comes in its own time, every moment is sublime... The art is inspired by my life experience and stories as a foundational myth on which we base/unfold/create our personal reality.
